entry.def: If someone is beheaded, their head is cut off, usually because they have been found guilty of a crime.

example.ex: Charles I was beheaded by the Cromwellians.
example.tran: 查理一世被克伦威尔派斩首。

means.word_mean: 1. having had the head cut off;
